channel.title: Code Tag Annoyance
channel.description:
Well, I seem to use the code tags multiple times in one post. It annoying for this reason.
When you go to the little drop down box and select 'java' you press it and it gives the [code=java][/code] tags around it. But if you go down the put another thing in 'java' it won't work. You need to do it manually.
Could you possibly fix this so it makes doing it easier?

item.title: Code Tag Annoyance
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

never mind I had no idea it was already added <3

Read full topic

item.title: Code Tag Annoyance
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:18, topic:443390”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=546075.msg4003197#msg4003197 date=1338311095]
This is a common flaw in the SMF post editor and well outside the scope of the syntax highlighter. I’m not even sure if this was ever fixed (or can be, as it seems to be to be a dom event limitation over anything else). So yeah, it probably won’t be fixed anytime soon. Typing it out is much easier.
[/quote]OH I figured that much, I was referring to another question I asked Tom the other day. Wouldn’t syntax highlighting be a handy dandy tool to have on here? Would look more professional.[/quote]

public class Main {
     public static void main(String args[]) {
          System.out.println("Ohaithere");
     }
}

Pretty sure that has syntax highlighting. Considering there is no actual set color theme for syntax highlighting, I don’t see what the problem is

Read full topic

This is a common flaw in the SMF post editor and well outside the scope of the syntax highlighter. item.title: Code Tag Annoyance
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

it does work, you just need to select something else after you selected java, and then delete it
for example,
[\code=java][\code]

[code tag=some other language][/still a code tag]
[\code=java][\code]

Read full topic

item.title: Code Tag Annoyance
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I don’t see the point in using the Java tag anyway, the code tag is really just as easy to read. Yeah I’m aware of syntax highlighting but using an IDE or Notepad++ will do it for you anyway

Read full topic

I also never said you were raging.
[/quote]

Wow, I’m stating a little flaw and you guys have a rage?

?
And what do you mean by don’t have time? Do you really need the extra 7 seconds of doing whatever crazy shit you do after making a post?[/quote]
He was talking about:

sinisoul:

Fucking type it out

item.title: Code Tag Annoyance
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Skyro:

Why the hell you guys all mad over 1 little flaw? Seriously if you aren’t going to support it don’t post some useless crap that only you and other haters want to read.

Why the hell can’t you stop being lazy and spamming? Every topic I’ve seen from you is pretty much spam.
Also, what are we hating on? This is basically the home of the trolls, don’t complain about flame because you’re acting all derpy.
